products.description: Even legends evolve. The latest version of these Elite boots is made from a completely new, technologically advanced Flytouch Plus leather. products.title: Cleats Nike Phantom Gx Ii Elite Erling Haaland Fg - Navy Blue
products.description: Do you have an obsession with improving your skills? These shoes were created specifically for you. In the heart of the storm, when chaos surrounds you, you finally managed to find the penalty area. Finish the action with the Phantom GX 2 Elite shoes. The revolutionary Nike Gripknit material covers the ball contact zone, while the Nike Cyclone 360 tread provides grip and agility. Elite cleats, created for you and the biggest stars in the world, stand out for their high quality, because you demand perfection from yourself and your footwear. This version pays tribute to Erling Haaland's Norwegian roots.Erling Haaland feels best in the picturesque Norwegian countryside, walking around his family farm with loved ones by his side. These cleats pay homage to his homeland, with the base adorned with the colors of its flag. The blue and green elements are a nod to the traditional costumes worn during Norway's Constitution Day celebrations.Nike Gripknit is a grippy material that provides exceptional ball feel. The special material covers the shoe's ball contact zone and stretches from the big toe area, through the laces, to the little toe, allowing for precise kicks. It also molds to the shape of the foot and provides excellent grip in both wet and dry conditions. The embossed microtexture works with the Gripknit technology, adapting to the foot and allowing for an even better ball feel.The Nike Cyclone 360 tread pattern allows for quick and agile movements, adding confidence so you can dynamically change direction and feel secure when the game picks up pace.The asymmetrical lacing allows for a larger contact area during dribbling, passing, and scoring goals. The modified lacing pattern increases adjustability in the midfoot area, making it easier to fit for those with flatter or higher arches. The Flyknit material is responsible for the fit and shape, as well as providing comfort around the collar.

products.title: Cleats Nike Zoom Mercurial Vapor 16 Elite Sg-Pro - Red
products.description: Do you have an obsession with speed? The biggest basketball stars have it too. That's why we created the Elite cleats with an improved 3/4 length Air Zoom cushion. This model will provide you and the fastest players with the acceleration you need to break through the defense line. As a result, we have created the most dynamic Mercurial shoes we have ever designed. All of this to satisfy your pursuit of perfection.Exceptional ball feelNike Gripknit is a grippy material that provides better ball feel. It has a larger surface area, giving you more space to control the ball during high-speed dribbling or to finish the game with an accurate shot on goal. In addition, it conforms to the shape of your foot and provides consistent grip in both wet and dry conditions, ensuring a snug fit comparable to track spikes. The embossed microtexture works with Gripknit technology, conforming to the foot and allowing for an even better ball feel.Dynamic gripThe wavy tread pattern created by the cascadingly placed cleats covers a larger surface area in the Air Zoom cushion area and provides proper grip. The largest cleat has the same height as traditional mid cleats, so the grip is consistent everywhere. In addition to the wavy tread, we have also used studs in the shape of fir trees and blades, which make it easier to stop during dynamic turns.Perfect fitThe Flyknit upper is designed for speed. The Atomknit fabric, an extremely lightweight and durable version of Flyknit, is placed on the sides to reduce the weight of the shoes and provide support. By combining Gripknit, Atomknit, and Flyknit technologies, we have created the thinnest Mercurial upper, allowing for better ball feel and a faster fit to the foot.

products.title: Cleats Nike Zoom Mercurial Vapor 16 Elite Mds Fg - Sky Blue
products.description: Do you have an obsession with speed? The biggest basketball stars have it too. That's why we created the Elite cleats with an improved 3/4 length Air Zoom cushion. This model will provide you and the fastest players with the acceleration you need to break through the defense line. As a result, we have created the most dynamic Mercurial shoes we have ever designed. All to satisfy your pursuit of perfection.Exceptional ball feelNike Gripknit is a grippy material that provides better ball feel. It has a larger surface area, giving you more space to control the ball during high-speed dribbling or to finish the game with an accurate shot on goal. In addition, it conforms to the shape of the foot and provides consistent grip in both wet and dry conditions, ensuring a snug fit comparable to track spikes. The embossed microtexture works with Gripknit technology, conforming to the foot and allowing for even better ball feel.Dynamic gripThe wavy tread pattern created by the cascadingly placed cleats covers a larger surface area in the Air Zoom cushion area and provides proper grip. The largest cleat has the same height as traditional mid cleats, so the grip is consistent everywhere. In addition to the wavy tread, we have also used studs in the shape of fir trees and blades, which make it easier to stop during dynamic turns.Perfect fitThe Flyknit upper is designed for speed. The Atomknit fabric, an extremely lightweight and durable version of Flyknit, is placed on the sides to reduce the weight of the shoes and provide support. By combining Gripknit, Atomknit, and Flyknit technologies, we have created the thinnest Mercurial upper, allowing for better ball feel and faster adaptation to the foot.

features.manufacturers_data: Global Distributor Of Nike, Inc. 5701 West Slaughter Lane, Bldg A130 Austin Tx 78749, Us Tel.1-888-588-8834, Info@Athleteps.Com

products.title: Cleats Nike Zoom Mercurial Vapor 16 Elite Fg - Lime
products.description: Do you have an obsession with speed? The biggest basketball stars have it too. That's why we created the Elite cleats with an improved 3/4 length Air Zoom cushion. This model will provide you and the fastest players with the acceleration you need to break through the defense line. As a result, we have created the most dynamic Mercurial shoes we have ever designed. All to satisfy your pursuit of perfection.Exceptional ball feelNike Gripknit is a grippy material that provides better ball feel. It has a larger surface area, giving you more space to control the ball during high-speed dribbling or to finish the game with an accurate shot on goal. In addition, it conforms to the shape of the foot and provides consistent grip in both wet and dry conditions, ensuring a snug fit comparable to track spikes. The embossed microtexture works with Gripknit technology, conforming to the foot and allowing for even better ball feel.Dynamic gripThe wavy tread pattern created by the cascadingly placed cleats covers a larger surface area in the Air Zoom cushion area and provides proper grip. The largest cleat has the same height as traditional mid cleats, so the grip is consistent everywhere. In addition to the wavy tread, we have also used studs in the shape of fir trees and blades, which make it easier to stop during dynamic turns.Perfect fitThe Flyknit upper is designed for speed. The Atomknit fabric, an extremely lightweight and durable version of Flyknit, is placed on the sides to reduce the weight of the shoes and provide support. By combining Gripknit, Atomknit, and Flyknit technologies, we have created the thinnest Mercurial upper, allowing for better ball feel and faster adaptation to the foot.

products.title: Cleats Nike Phantom Luna Ii Elite Sg-Pro Player Edition
products.description: Nike presents Phantom Luna - innovative football boots designed by women footballers and created with athletes of all genders in mind. This unique combination of exceptional performance, revolutionary technology and elegant design sets these boots apart from the competition. The unique, close-fitting Gripknit on the upper part of the boot, made of exceptionally high-quality material, guarantees unparalleled fit, greater control and exceptional ball handling in all weather conditions. The Asym Fit technology provides optimal comfort and support, thanks to the anatomically slanted collar and increased adjustment in the middle of the foot, allowing for the perfect fit regardless of gender. The newly developed Cyclone 360 sole, based on the opinions of women footballers, has been designed to easily release from the ground during fast, directional movements. The insoles in these boots can be exchanged, further increasing their functionality and adaptability to individual needs.

products.title: Cleats Nike Tiempo Legend 10 Elite Sg-Pro Player Edition - Silver
products.description: Even legends undergo constant changes. The latest version of these Elite boots is made from a completely new, technologically advanced Flytouch Plus leather. It is softer than natural leather, so it adapts to the foot and, together with the All Conditions Control elements (grippy texture even on rainy days) will help you set the pace of the game. The Legend 10 boots are lighter and slimmer than any other Tiempo models, so they are suitable for playing in any position - whether you pass the ball through the defensive line with watchmaker precision or repel the opponent's quick attack. The Anti-Clog Traction solution applied in this version protects against mud sticking in the sole.See those microscopic dots on the upper? They support the ball contact area for passes, shots and dribbling, making the boots look slimmer. Another advantage is the lack of additional lining. All these elements make the boots provide the control over the ball you need on the field. The foam pads from the Tiempo 9 model have been reduced so that the foot can be even closer to the ball. Instead, special lines are embossed on the boots. The All Conditions Control (ACC) technology adds texture to increase grip, so you can move confidently in any weather conditions.The technologically advanced Flytouch Plus leather is unbelievably soft. It helps the boots fit perfectly to the foot, providing comfort without excessive stretching of the material. The Flyknit material around the ankle gives a feeling of secure fit.

products.title: Cleats Mizuno Alpha Sr4 Japan Fg
products.description: Mizuno Alpha has been designed with unmatched speed in mind, weighing only 190 grams. This shoe, created for maximum velocity, utilizes Mizuno Enerzy foam for excellent cushioning and energy return, while the unique bouncy effect is guaranteed by the KaRVO™ plate in the forefoot. The Engineered Fit construction ensures a perfect fit and a nearly barefoot feel.Mizuno Alpha is the ultimate choice for players seeking exceptional speed, agility, and flexibility.The "Home and Glory" collection pays tribute to Seville, the city where Sergio Ramos' legendary career began. The collection stands out with a rich palette of burgundy, off-white, copper, and black, which not only reflect the colors of the city's football team that transformed Ramos from a promising youth into a top defender, but also features traditional Spanish tile patterns, characteristic of Seville. This design choice reflects Sergio Ramos' deep ties to his roots and celebrates the art of Spanish tiles - an art that, like his football career, requires time, dedication, and passion.

features.manufacturers_data: Mizuno Co., Rivium Quadrant 205 2909Lc, Capelle Aan Den Ijssel, Nl, Service-Eu@Shop.Mizuno.Eu

products.title: Cleats Mizuno Morelia Neo Iv Beta Sr4 Japan
products.description: Morelia Neo IV Beta was designed with the highest comfort and performance in mind. Based on the Japanese philosophy of Kaizen, which means continuous improvement, the fourth generation of Morelia Neo has been carefully refined to provide a second skin feeling, combining the latest materials from the past decade with the highest quality kangaroo leather.Key features include a 5mm higher tongue for a secure fit around the ankle, a richer inner insole for better grip, and a reinforced Y-shaped midfoot bridge designed to withstand intense loads during explosive movements. Suitable for all surfaces, Morelia Neo IV Beta is designed for maximum performance, with each element optimized to elevate the game of every player.The "Home and Glory" collection pays tribute to Seville, the city where Sergio Ramos' legendary career began. The collection stands out with a rich color palette of burgundy, off-white, copper, and black, which not only reflects the colors of the city's football team that transformed Ramos from a promising youth into a top defender, but also features traditional Spanish tile patterns, characteristic of Seville. This design choice reflects Sergio Ramos' deep ties to his roots and celebrates the art of Spanish tiles - an art that, like his football career, requires time, dedication, and passion.

products.title: Cleats Nike Zoom Mercurial Superfly 10 Elite Ag-Pro - Sky Blue
products.description: Do you have an obsession with speed? The biggest basketball stars do too. That's why we created the Elite cleats with an enhanced 3/4 length Air Zoom cushion. This model will provide you and the fastest players with the acceleration you need to break through the defense line. As a result, we have created the most dynamic Mercurial shoes we have ever designed. All of this to satisfy your pursuit of perfection.Exceptional ball feelNike Gripknit is a grippy material that provides better ball feel. It has a larger surface area, giving you more space to control the ball during high-speed dribbling or to finish the game with an accurate shot on goal. In addition, it conforms to the shape of the foot and provides consistent grip in both wet and dry conditions, ensuring a snug fit comparable to track spikes. The embossed microtexture works with Gripknit technology, conforming to the foot and allowing for an even better ball feel.Dynamic gripThe wavy tread pattern created by the cascadingly placed cleats covers a larger surface area in the Air Zoom cushion area and provides proper grip. The largest cleat has the same height as traditional mid cleats, so the grip is consistent everywhere. In addition to the wavy tread, we have also used studs in the shape of fir trees and blades, which make it easier to stop during dynamic turns.Perfect fitThe Flyknit upper is designed with speed in mind. The Atomknit fabric, an extremely lightweight and durable version of Flyknit, is placed on the sides to reduce the weight of the shoes and provide support. By combining Gripknit, Atomknit, and Flyknit technologies, we have created the thinnest Mercurial upper, allowing for better ball feel and a faster fit to the foot. The Dynamic Fit collar is made of soft, flexible material and wraps around the ankle, providing a snug fit.

In addition to the wavy tread, we have also used studs in the shape of fir trees and blades, which make it easier to stop during dynamic turns.Perfect fitThe Flyknit upper is designed for speed. The Atomknit fabric, an extremely lightweight and durable version of Flyknit, is placed on the sides to reduce the weight of the shoes and provide support. By combining Gripknit, Atomknit, and Flyknit technologies, we have created the thinnest Mercurial upper, allowing for better ball feel and a faster fit to the foot.

products.description: Football boots on artificial turfEven legends are subject to constant change. In addition to the wavy tread, we have also used new V-shaped and blade-shaped cleats that make it easier to stop during dynamic turns.Perfect fitThe Flyknit upper is designed for speed. The Atomknit fabric, an extremely lightweight and durable version of Flyknit, is placed on the sides to reduce the weight of the shoes and provide support. By combining Gripknit, Atomknit, and Flyknit technologies, we have created the thinnest Mercurial upper, allowing for better ball feel and a faster fit to the foot. The Dynamic Fit collar is made of soft, flexible material and wraps around the ankle, providing a snug fit.

products.title: Cleats Nike Tiempo Legend 10 Elite Sg-Pro Anti Clog - Black
products.description: Even legends undergo constant changes. The latest version of these Elite boots is made from a completely new, technologically advanced Flytouch Plus leather. It is softer than natural leather, so it adapts to the foot and, together with the All Conditions Control elements (grippy texture even on rainy days), will help you set the pace of the game. The Legend 10 boots are lighter and slimmer than any other Tiempo model, making them suitable for playing any position - whether you pass the ball through the defensive line with watchmaker precision or fend off a quick attack from the opposing team. They support the ball contact area for passing, shooting and dribbling, giving the boots a slimmer look. Another advantage is the lack of additional lining. All these elements make the boots provide the control over the ball you need on the field. The foam pads from the Tiempo 9 have been reduced so that the foot can be even closer to the ball. Instead, special lines are embossed on the boots. The All Conditions Control (ACC) technology adds texture for increased grip, so you can move confidently in any weather conditions.Natural fitThe technologically advanced Flytouch Plus leather is unbelievably soft. It helps the boots fit perfectly to the foot, providing comfort without excessive stretching of the material. The Flyknit material around the ankle gives a feeling of secure fit.Grip on the fieldThe sole plate connects the conical studs on the heel, providing optimal grip and stability when braking and changing direction in any conditions.

products.title: Cleats Nike Zoom Mercurial Superfly 9 Elite Fg - Beige
products.description: Boost your game to the next level with the Superfly 9 Elite cleats. Featuring Nike's revolutionary Zoom Air cushioning, specifically designed for football, and a textured upper for an unparalleled touch on the ball, so you can give it your all in those last, crucial minutes of the match. And the lightweight construction makes you feel like you're flying across the pitch.For the first time ever, Nike has developed an entirely new Zoom Air cushioning specifically designed for football, which is placed in the plate and provides an additional level of dynamic cushioning for players playing on the hardest and most demanding surfaces.The upper is made of Vaporposite material, which combines a textured mesh with a premium lining, providing optimal ball control at high speeds. The lining makes the entire upper surface pleasant to the touch. It wraps around the foot precisely and softly, while stabilizing it, resulting in a more natural feel of the ball during dribbling, passing, and scoring.The soft and stretchy Flyknit wraps around the ankle and provides a precise fit. The speed reinforcement inside the entire construction is made of thin but strong material, which keeps the foot on the plate and provides optimal fit without unnecessary weight.The tri-star studs provide multi-directional traction with every step, so you can instantly change direction. The heel studs provide traction and stability when braking. The middle studs are responsible for traction during dynamic rebound from the toes.The improved silhouette features a better fit around the foot. We achieved this result thanks to the involvement of hundreds of athletes testing our product. This allowed us to get a better profiled toe and a more fitted heel.The Pebax® plate with micro-cuts allows for instant acceleration.The minimal thickness gives a barefoot feeling.

features.manufacturers_data: Global Distributor Of Nike, Inc. 5701 West Slaughter Lane, Bldg A130 Austin Tx 78749, Us Tel.1-888-588-8834, Info@Athleteps.Com

products.title: Cleats Nike Zoom Mercurial Superfly 9 Elite Sg-Pro Player Edition - Beige
products.description: Change the game with the bold design of the Superfly 9 Elite SG-Pro boots. Featuring Nike's first-ever football-specific Zoom Air cushioning, and a textured upper for an unprecedented touch on the ball, you can give it your all in those last, decisive minutes of the match. Feel explosive speed on the pitch and play the ball with lightning speed. Fast is in the Air. For the first time ever, Nike has developed a completely new, football-specific Zoom Air cushioning that extends 3/4 of the length of the boot. Placed in the plate, it gives an even better feeling of responsiveness and allows you to move faster on the pitch and gain an advantage over your opponents in the most important moments of the match, to score a goal or escape the defenders. The speed reinforcement inside the entire construction is made of thin but strong material that keeps the foot on the outsole and provides optimal fit without unnecessary weight. Metal studs on the outsole provide unparalleled grip and allow you to quickly detach the boots from the ground. The soft and stretchy Flyknit wraps around the ankle and provides a precise fit. The improved silhouette features a better fit around the foot. This was achieved through the involvement of hundreds of athletes testing our product. This allowed for a better profiled toe and a more fitted heel. The upper is made of Vaporposite material, which combines a textured mesh with premium material, providing optimal control of the ball at high speeds. The material makes the entire upper surface pleasant to the touch. It wraps the foot precisely and softly, while stabilizing it, which translates into a more natural feel of the ball during dribbling, passing or scoring goals.

products.description: Step into a new day and show the world what you're made of. A bright, iridescent plate, futuristic graphics and vibrant colors reminiscent of a gradient sunrise evoke the powerful female game. This is a power that can unite us on and off the pitch. We've taken feedback from athletes to provide the traction you need to play fast and confidently. That's what football is all about after all. The subtle drawcords in the collars allow for better ball contact with the ground around the ankle when receiving and passing.

products.description: Even legends undergo constant changes. The latest version of these Elite boots is made from a completely new, technologically advanced Flytouch Plus leather. products.title: Cleats Nike Tiempo Legend 10 Elite Sg-Pro Player Edition - Mint
products.description: Even legends undergo constant transformations. The latest version of these Elite cleats is made of a completely new, technologically advanced Flytouch Plus leather. It is softer than natural leather, which allows it to mold to the foot and, together with the All Conditions Control elements (a grippy texture even on rainy days), will help you set the pace of the game. The Legend 10 shoes are lighter and sleeker than any other Tiempo models, making them suitable for playing in any position - whether you're passing the ball with watchmaker precision through the defensive line or defending against a fast attack from the opposing team. The Anti-Clog Traction solution used in this version on the soleplate prevents mud from sticking.Do you see those microscopic dots on the upper? They enhance the ball-to-boot contact zone for passing, shooting, and dribbling. This gives the shoes a sleeker look. Another advantage is the lack of additional padding. All of these elements provide the ball control you need on the field. The foam cushions from the Tiempo 9 model have been reduced so that the foot can be even closer to the ball. Instead, special lines are embossed on the cleats. The All Conditions Control (ACC) technology adds texture for increased grip, allowing you to move confidently in any weather conditions.The technologically advanced FlyTouch Plus leather is incredibly soft. It helps the cleats perfectly mold to the foot, providing comfort without excessive stretching of the material. The Flyknit material around the ankle gives a feeling of secure fit.

products.title: Cleats Nike Zoom Mercurial Superfly 9 Elite Sg-Pro Anti Clog Traction - White
products.description: Change the game with the bold design of the Superfly 9 Elite SG-Pro boots. We've incorporated Zoom Air cushioning, specifically designed for football, and a textured upper for an unparalleled touch, so you can give it your all in those last, decisive minutes of the match. Feel explosive speed on the pitch and play the ball with lightning speed. Fast is in the Air. The Anti-Clog Traction technology in the sole plate protects against mud build-up.Welcome to the pitch, ZoomFor the first time ever, Nike has developed an entirely new Zoom Air cushioning specifically designed for football, which stretches across 3/4 of the length of the boot. Placed in the plate, it gives an even better feeling of responsiveness and allows you to move faster on the pitch and find free space in the most important moments of the match to score or escape defenders.Boost your speedThe reinforcement responsible for speed, placed inside the entire structure, is made of a thin but strong material that keeps the foot on the outer sole and provides optimal fit without unnecessary loading.Anchor and goMetal studs on the outer sole provide unparalleled grip and allow you to quickly detach the boots from the ground.Even better fitThe soft and stretchy Flyknit wraps the ankle and provides a precise fit. The improved shape is characterized by a better fit around the foot. We achieved this result thanks to the involvement of hundreds of athletes testing our product. This allowed us to get a better profiled toe and a more fitted heel.Feel the ballThe upper is made of Vaporposite material, which combines a textured mesh with top-quality material, providing optimal control of the ball at high speeds. The material makes the entire upper surface pleasant to the touch. It wraps the foot precisely and softly, while stabilizing it, which translates into a more natural feel of the ball during dribbling, passing or shooting at the goal.

products.title: Cleats Nike Tiempo Legend 10 Elite Sg-Pro Player Edition - White
products.description: Even legends undergo constant changes. The latest version of these Elite boots is made from a completely new, technologically advanced Flytouch Plus leather. It is softer than natural leather, so it adapts to the foot and, together with the All Conditions Control elements (grippy texture even on rainy days) will help you set the pace of the game. The Legend 10 boots are lighter and slimmer than any other Tiempo models, so they are suitable for playing in any position - whether you pass the ball through the defensive line with watchmaker precision or repel the opponent's quick attack. The Anti-Clog Traction solution applied in this version protects against mud sticking in the sole.See those microscopic dots on the upper? They support the ball contact area for passes, shots and dribbling, making the boots look slimmer. Another advantage is the lack of additional lining. All these elements make the boots provide the control over the ball you need on the field. The foam pads from the Tiempo 9 model have been reduced so that the foot can be even closer to the ball. Instead, special lines are embossed on the boots. The All Conditions Control (ACC) technology adds texture to increase grip, so you can move confidently in any weather conditions.The technologically advanced Flytouch Plus leather is unbelievably soft. It helps the boots fit perfectly to the foot, providing comfort without excessive stretching of the material. The Flyknit material around the ankle gives a feeling of secure fit.

products.title: Cleats Puma King Platinum 21 Mxsg - Black
products.description: The great return of the King! Puma has been around for many years without its "Kings" but now that has changed. The Puma King is back on the pitch. Lighter than ever, the best cult classic impresses with technology while paying homage to its predecessors. The Puma King Platinum is constructed with the highest quality leather for a luxurious feel, featuring an integrated knitted tongue for better fit. There's no denying that the King is back. The Puma King has been worn by a royal football team since its inception in 1968. Players who donned the iconic boot include Cruyff, Eusebio, Pele and Maradona. Whether you're a weekend player or a professional, these shoes will look great and make you feel great.
